item.description: Have you had a past life recall? Has it given you insight or information that helped you with a problem today? Let’s discuss the reason for past life recalls and how they can help you. We’ll also share techniques for remembering past lives, and working with these memories to make them a more valuable resource in this lifetime. You are invited to share or just to listen with an open heart and mind to the experiences of others.
item.how_to_find_us: We wil be in the library meeting room. Please ask the librarian for directions.

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Past Lives-How they Help us Today
